S.FORM: Andrej Kiska u siwkay niza 2 bulad 2 demiad, Andrej Kiska, u misingkiway. 1963 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung nu Slovakia ayza sa ci Andrej Kiska, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 6 bulad 15 demiad. ciniza sa ku pacakayay, mikuwanay. u ngangan niza u ngangan nu Hulam: u ngangan nu Lipun: u ngangan nu Amilika: Andrej Kiska kakuniza sasulitan nu Hulam atu Amilika , . 2014 . Andrej Kiska is a Slovak entrepreneur, writer and philanthropist who has been President of Slovakia since 2014. He ran as an independent candidate in the 2014 presidential election and was elected as President in the second round of voting. He has written two books about happiness, success and his life. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
